modName: FoxWood Fennec RAce followers and player home
summary: Fennec race playerhome with 2 followers each with their own ai package
descriptionHtml:
Requires Fennec Race from steam workshop by Jelly

Fennec Race can be found Here:http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=234034337


Adds 2 Fennec Race Followers
Terranii the female
Kazuma the male

Both followers can train you in archery (Testing to make sure they work )

adds 1 playerhome with living space for these followers

Adds the Player home FoxWood in the tundra near Whiterun
Fox Wood is a Large Tree that the fennec race has Magically Grown and Built this Player home upon as a forward camp for them to stay while in skyrim



Future additions
-More Fennec Race NPCs
-Shopkeepers
-Pets
-More Followers
-Children
-Adoptible Children
Small Farm Plots
a dungeon under the roots of the Tree



Thanks to Jelly from Steam Workshop for makeing and giving me permision to use Such a Great race mod:)
author: Elfendrago
